title: Words From Names
description: Everyday words derived from people's names

questions.question: The word 'boycott' comes from Captain Charles Boycott. What was his occupation?
The diesel engine is named after Rudolf Diesel. What nationality was he?
The word 'cardigan' comes from the 7th Earl of Cardigan. What is he most famous for?
options: Leading the Charge of the Light Brigade

questions.question: The 'sandwich' is named after the Earl of Sandwich. Why did he supposedly want bread around his meat?
options: To keep his hands clean while playing cards

questions.question: Wellington boots are named after the Duke of Wellington. What major battle did he win?

questions.question: The sideburns hairstyle is named after which American Civil War general?
